author: Simon Difford
description: A blue-rinsed riff on the Tarling's 1933 competition winning Red Lion, created with the hope of celebrating another English competition win. There is one orange-flavoured liqueur for each of the three lions.
name: Three Lions (on the shirt)
recipeIngredient: 5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
2.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
